department.dept_long_name: Department of Organismic and Evolutionary Biology

course.title: Biology of Mammals
course.meeting_text: Hours to be arranged, and a weekly three-hour lab on Wednesdays.
course.description: An introduction to the biology of mammals. Lectures and laboratories examine the morphology, systematics, natural history, behavior, ecology, evolutionary relationships, and biogeography of all major taxa.
course.notes: Freshman only admitted under exceptional circumstances.
